title: ezhil perum iru vizhi
sahitya:
ezhil tarum iru vizhi pozhiyum karuNai mazhai enrum enmEl irukkalAgAdA unadu


anupallavi

  vazhi taruvAi enrE vagaiyODu tudittEn vaLar malar kAdal;iyE aruL manam irangiyE


caraNam    onrum puriyavillai (ingu) anrum inrum enrum un peyar perum kallai uLattODu kai tozhudEn
unnai tozhuda anbar uyarndAr enrE purANam uraittiTTa mozhi poyyO aNaittiDum annaiyE
